scripts.serve: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf build/ && next dev
scripts.start: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf build/ && next build && next start
scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf build/ && next build
scripts.export: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf build/ && next build && next export -o TheDiceRoll.github.io/ && touch TheDiceRoll.github.io/.nojekyll && cd ../TheDiceRoll.github.io && mv .git ../backup && cd ../ && rm -rf TheDiceRoll.github.io && cd TheDiceRoll && mv TheDiceRoll.github.io ../ && cd ../backup && mv .git ../TheDiceRoll.github.io && cd ../TheDiceRoll.github.io && git add .
